name: BACTERIAVERSE
description:
Imagine yourself as a small bacterium, alone in a vast unknown world full of challenges. With its minuscule size, you have to find your way to reach the finish line, but the world is vast and full of dangers that can hinder your journey.

As you move around the world, you realize that weather conditions are extreme and can change quickly. The intense heat of the sun can be fatal, as can the icy cold of the moon.

Fortunately, you'll find a few computers along the way that can help you overcome these hurdles. With them, you can change the weather and time of day for your convenience. But beware, the world is dangerous and there are attractive red balls that can be fatal with just one tap.

You will need to be agile and smart to survive in this hostile world and reach your goal. Remember that you are a small bacterium in a huge, unknown world, and only your skills and strategy can guarantee your survival. With each victory, you will feel the emotion of overcoming and conquering your journey towards the finish line. You'll experience a mix of emotions, from the adrenaline of speed to the relief of overcoming a difficult obstacle.

The world can be lonely, but you have yourself and your determination to guide you on your quest. The adventure is just beginning, are you ready to face this challenge?
